bool Mpeg4IPMP4IPMPDescriptor::SetIPMPData (  ByteT *  data,
UInt32T  len
)  [virtual]
 

Set IPMP data.

If IPMP data already exists, it must be cleaned and replaced by newly created one. Data representing ipmp data must be locally copied.

Returns:
Boolean indicating success or not.
